CustomField.description: Allows the apex batch size to be adjusted for when Invoice Emails are merged. The batch size defines how many Invoices will be included per batch. When left blank the batch size of 20 will be used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Allows the apex batch size to be adjusted for when Invoice Emails are merged. The batch size defines how many Invoices will be included per batch. When left blank the batch size of 20 will be used.
CustomField.label: Merge Invoice Emails Batch Size
